name: goeth
description:
Increase the value of ethe by playing cards and overthrow the bank!

Each card has a cost and an effect. There are 2 possible effects, hit (damage the bank) and draw (draw a card). Hit and draw are the first two square of the image below. The followings 4 colored squares are the possible card costs. 

By default you can always pay 3 colors for the remaining. Powers in the game can improve the initial deal ;)

While you play sometimes you may have to spin the weel (representing external circumstances). For example the Bear Market.

By playing cards you'll develop special powers like The Merge!
